item.title: By: Random Dialogue
item.dc:creator: Random Dialogue
item.description:
<strong>Linkspam Tastes Best When Fried...</strong>
Last night’s McGee talk was very good. He touched on the long history of scientific cooking, and went into some detail on elements of modern cuisine; Also known as Molecular Gastronomy. The depth of field in this area of cooking is quite deep, an...
item.content:encoded:
Linkspam Tastes Best When Fried…

Last night’s McGee talk was very good. He touched on the long history of scientific cooking, and went into some detail on elements of modern cuisine; Also known as Molecular Gastronomy. The depth of field in this area of cooking is quite deep, an…
